citations.narrative:
The temperature in the guinea pig housing facility ranged from 55.5 - 56.9 degrees F as measured with a kestrel. The
licensee had turned off the heat yesterday when it was warmer, but had forgotten to turn it back on for the cold night.
Guinea pigs kept in ambient temperatures that are too low may be subject to cold stress that may cause discomfort and
predispose them to developing other health issues.
The ambient temperature in indoor housing facilities for guinea pigs must not fall below 60 degrees F.
Correct by: December 28, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee and a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.26(a) 
   
Facilities, indoor. 
The temperature in the guinea pig housing facility ranged from 55.5 - 56.9 degrees F as measured with a kestrel. The 
licensee had turned off the heat yesterday when it was warmer, but had forgotten to turn it back on for the cold night.  
Guinea pigs kept in ambient temperatures that are too low may be subject to cold stress that may cause discomfort and 
predispose them to developing other health issues. 
The ambient temperature in indoor housing facilities for guinea pigs must not fall below 60 degrees F. 
Correct by: December 28, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee and a facility representative. 
 
 n
